channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: March Madness Blog Post
item.description: Here we will have some libaries loaded in to get things started. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.4 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.3.1 ✓ forcats 0.4.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(tidymodels) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────── tidymodels 0.
